SELECT COUNT(*), READYN FROM ALARM GROUP BY RECEIVER, READYN HAVING RECEIVER = #{receiver, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND READYN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ALARM ( ANO, RECEIVER, SENDER, TYPE, INSERTDATE, READYN ) VALUES( #{ano, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiver, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{readyn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM ALARM ORDER BY INSERTDATE DESC ) WHERE RECEIVER = #{receiver, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND READYN = 'N' WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
mapper.update: UPDATE ALARM SET READYN = #{readyn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ANO=#{ano,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
